CustomField.description:
Old Value: IF(ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.Contract_Term__c, ""),0,IF(ISPICKVAL(Charge_Type__c,"MRC"), (TotalPrice * CASE(Opportunity.Contract_Term__c, "*6 Month", 6, "*18 Month", 18, "1 Year",12, "2 Years",24, "3 Years",36, "4 Years",48, "5 Years",60, 0)),0))
IF(ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.Contract_Term__c, ""),0,IF(ISPICKVAL(Charge_Type__c,"MRC"), (TotalPrice * CASE(Opportunity.Contract_Term__c, "*6 Month", 6, "*18 Month", 18, "1 Year",12, "2 Years",24, "3 Years",36, "4 Years",48, "5 Years",60, 0)),0))
CustomField.label: Contract Value MRC
